item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, March 3, 2025 at 4:20 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Youth and what happens when it's gone (58 points | 2 comments)
2. The Internals of PostgreSQL (165 points | 15 comments)
3. Show HN: Knowledge graph of restaurants and chefs, built using LLMs (24 points | 9 comments)
4. An Attempt to Catch Up with JIT Compilers (6 points | 3 comments)

6. Ask HN: Who is hiring? (March 2025) (11 points | 15 comments)
7. C1 modem breaks no speed records, but is power efficient (36 points | 14 comments)
8. Firefly ‘Blue Ghost’ lunar lander touches down on the moon (665 points | 161 comments)
9. FlakeUI (63 points | 15 comments)
10. Ask HN: Freelancer? Seeking freelancer? (March 2025) (4 points | 13 comments)
11. Fintoc (YC W21) Is Hiring Senior Software Engineer. Live Rent-Free in CL or MX ( | hide)

13. SOTA Code Retrieval with Efficient Code Embedding Models (9 points | 1 comment)
14. Made a scroll bar buddy that walks down the page when you scroll (503 points | 171 comments)

17. Difficult Employees (and How to Handle Them) (31 points | 15 comments)

19. Geothermal power is a climate moon shot beneath our feet (269 points | 263 comments)
20. Virtual museum of socialist era graphic design in Bulgaria (79 points | 9 comments)
21. Show HN: Tangled – Git collaboration platform built on atproto (119 points | 9 comments)
22. Phlex for Rails Emails: Action Mailer Without ERB (46 points | 8 comments)
23. Speedrunners are vulnerability researchers, they just don't know it yet (331 points | 80 comments)
24. Hallucinations in code are the least dangerous form of LLM mistakes (327 points | 254 comments)
25. The Pentium contains a complicated circuit to multiply by three (342 points | 128 comments)
26. Amazon’s delivery drones are grounded in College Station, Texas (67 points | 186 comments)
27. Smallpond – A lightweight data processing framework built on DuckDB and 3FS (289 points | 66 comments)
28. Gooey rubber that's slowly ruining old hard drives (253 points | 169 comments)
29. The weird afterlife of Xbox Kinect (54 points | 42 comments)
30. ninjavis – generate visualization from ninja build logs (26 points | 4 comments)
